features: 💦Brand New Games: Built-in 270 All-new puzzle games. Maybe you do not know most of them, but they definitely are full of fun. Believe that you and your kids will fall in love with this small machine.

💦Good Partner for Entertainment: Parents are worried about their little cute excessive use of mobile phones or pads, easy to be affected by bad content on the Internet. This game console is a very good substitute. It has no violent games, no matter whether your kids are on the road or at home, it is a reassuring partner.

💦User-friendly Design: Regardless of the screen size (3.0 inches) or the size and layout of the buttons, this game console fully considers the portability and practicality of the child. Make kids more comfortable to use.

💦Rechargeable: Built-in a rechargeable lithium battery which life can be achieved 4-5 hours. A general-purpose micro USB charging port, very convenient to charge. Eliminate the trouble of frequently replacing AAA batteries.

💦ABSOLUTELY STUNING－This game console is suitable for birthday, Christmas, and party gifts for both adults and children. This will be a big surprise for them. Our warranty covers any defect caused during product production and delivery. We can offer you full refund or free replacement within 30 days and 6 months warranty, whichever is at your most convenience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Welcome to the Great Boy store.This game console is a powerful and very interesting game console.It has a large 3.0-inch full color screen, rechargeable lithium battery, micro USB port,direction rocker, TV AV port/headphone port,support 2 players.It has 270 classic games pre-installed, it is suitable to follow you in and out of any occasion,even the ends of the earth. As a gift for children, friends, parents,on birthdays, holidays and other beautiful moments are perfect.

More Fun And Better Than Ever! Newly designed game console is now brighter then ever with a bigger screen. Pre-installed 270 classic retro games, you can basically enjoy all the wonderful 8-bit retro games. The artificial appearance design and buttons layout make you enjoy the game more smoothly.Enjoy in the ocean of games. Specifications Dimensions:L*W*H 6.3*2.8*0.8 inches Pre-installed games: 270 retro games Battery: Rechargeable li-ion battery Players: Support 2 players Charging port: Micro USB Charging time: 1 hours Battery Endurance time: 4-6 hours Material: Non-toxic ABS Plastic

Just Like You Remember! A large number of classic retro games pre-installed.Inspired by the 80's game classic, the game console will allow you to re-live and share great memories alongside a new generation of kids!

Rechargeable,Use Peace of Mind Built-in rechargeable lithium battery,eliminates the hassle of buying and replacing batteries frequently,entertainment kids convenient parents. Using a standard Micro USB charging interface,compatible with most electronic device adapters.Plug and play with power bank even without a battery installed. Charging one hour can play for 4-6 hours.With low battery reminder function and full-charge indicator color change function (indicator light turns red is full-charge). Hook Up to TV Connect to your TV via AV out, you can easily enjoy vivid and exciting video games in a big screen. When you are on vacation at home, you can have a parent-child interaction with your kids.Both adults and children can be immersed in the joyous world of the games. Support TV format:NTSC.Compatible with most TVs. Support 2 Players Some games are support 2 player .Some of these games can be played by 2 people at the same time, and some are 2 people in turn.Note that when running a two-player game, you need to insert the game controller first, and then run the game, press the select key to select the two-player mode. Support Headset This game console has a 3.5MM universal headphone jack, which compatible with most of the headphones on the market.This allows you to enjoy the game calmly and quietly in public and avoid disturbing people around you.

Surprisingly Beautiful Gift As a gift, we believe that this little device will not disappoint you.It exceed your expectations with signature quality and excellence. We believe that kids come first. That's why we aim to create outstanding, innovative toys that provide learning opportunities through play. Package Contains 1 x Game console 1 x User Manual 1 x Gamepad 1 x Li-ion Battery 1 x USB Cable 1 x AV cable Specially designed retail gift box Friendly Reminder Before using the product, please read the instructions carefully. Do not short circuit battery contacts or dispose of batteries in fire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This game is awesome!
reviews.reviewText: This little game is so convenient & so much fun! It brings nostalgia to my home, while my kids are having fun. It works so well & has so many options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it
reviews.reviewText: Grandkids love this game. They were excited to find games they knew. They also like that you can have 2 players. Had no issues with packaging or delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not too bad
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this product for my children; 6 & 7 yr. olds. They actually like the game however the remote for 2player games doesn’t work and when I hook it up to the tv it glitches. Has a weird sound that comes out; nevertheless the kids seem to enjoy but I would only recommend if you’re using it to keep them busy on long car rides because of the battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my 3 year old, it is a little hard to connect for two players on the tv screen but actual handheld device is pretty cool. Not color but tons and ton of different old school games loaded on here for hours of entertainment. Im not gonna lie we have let it die out yet so not sure how long the batter actually lasts but at min of two to three hours we have gone with no probs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: My seven year old is addicted! We love all the different super Mario games and 2 player games. The additional plug in remote included is genius. My five year old enjoys being player 2, though she is not as technologically advanced as her sis and has a harder time timing jumps and such. The battery could last longer, but for 300+ games and at least 2 hours of straight gameplay, the value is astounding! It can be played while charging. It has a headphone jack, although I haven't tried it. If my kids were to break it, I'd buy it again, though it's a pretty lightweight but sturdy construction. I even enjoy sitting back and playing with them. The screen is great and lit to be played at night. I haven't tried it outside, but figure it would be fine in shade or in a car as most screens are. It's a comparable screen to the Gameboy advance with its own backlighting. There is volume adjustment which is much needed bc it has some loud sound when it's all the way up. All the games are old school graphics which is a real throwback that I love. I haven't found the game pictured in the product image and am wondering if that type of graphic is on this system or if it is just a image that was placed. It doesn't have any save features, so once you die in super Mario for example, you'll have to start from the beginning. This might be frustrating for older kids, but for my young kids, it gives them a video game history experience and hand eye coordination practice in quite a few types and styles of games. Either way, I'm happy with my purchase and would buy again if this got broken or lost! I'll probably buy one when my 2 and 3 year old reach this age.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Game Console
reviews.reviewText: Gift for my grandson. He enjoys it daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not the best
reviews.reviewText: Bought these as a Christmas gift for my nephews and 1 stopped working day one of use. Got a replacement and now both are not working. The screen goes blank bit sound is playing. Not the greatest toy...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality is just ok
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this game is just ok. You can tell it is poorly made. It works great just not well made, even for the price I wish it was just a little bit better made.

reviews.reviewTitle: No the graphics aren't as good as the photo, but...
reviews.reviewText: Rated 5 because- easy menu system- decent enough graphics and sound- the variety of quality mini games is great!- lots of classics going as far back as 'lode runner- 2 player capable with extra controller- usb chargeable and tv plug ins included- decent enough build quality8 year old is not going to notice anything out his car window for a long time

Dont waste your money. This thing is garbage. Some games don't even work. The games stated in the Q&A section are false. None of those games are on this. No Mario, Tetris, Pvz, donkey Kong, Pacman. Very very cheap, something is broken inside and rattling around. And the thumb control on the unit is useless as it spins around 360 degrees as your trying to control. The D pad doesn't repsond some times... Basically, don't waste your money. All the positive reviews must be talking about something else, because I don't see what they are saying in this unit.
Fonctionne bien. Bon rapport qualité prix et vraiment rétro!
It has lots of different games and the kids love it.
Bought this as a birthday giftBirthday was after the return timeThe controller doesn’t workStuck with a dud
